alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 11:55PM CDT until June 12 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN TEXAS...NORTHERN HANSFORD AND NORTHEASTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 1155 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Texhoma, or 20 miles southwest of Guymon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Goodwell, Hardesty and Texhoma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
